import React, {Fragment} from 'react' import { Card, Container, Row, Col } from "reactstrap"; import Button from '@material-ui/core/Button'; import './Profile.css' const Profile = ({profilePicture, lastname, firstname, email, biography, component}) => { return (
e.preventDefault()}>

{lastname} {' '} {firstname}

{email}

{biography}

{component}
) } export default Profile
